name: Personalised Name Signs
description: These name signs can be personalised to include a single word to suit your needs or make a perfect gift, you can have; * A name * A room (i.e kitchen) * A date A variety of materials are used for our word signs and we have added a description here for you to read about how they are made. After an order has been received with word and colour specifications the fun starts. Fabric for lettering is carefully chosen and each letter is cut out by hand and stitched to hessian. Buttons are added and vary on each design. MDF is cut to size and covered with wadding and hessian piece added. These are all stapled by hand and plaited twine is then attached to the top for the hanger, again all done by hand. The back of the board is then covered with fabric to finish this piece, ready to display in your home. The font was drawn up by Mabel and the board sizes offered fit these perfectly to create a unique sign just for you. The signs come in a variety of sizes (cost varies) or you can contact us if you require something different. Specification *Size: Various *Materials used: Hessian, Selection of Cotton materials, Buttons, MDF, wadding, twine and staples. *Completion time: 7 days approx We will contact you after you place your order to find out your wording and colour preferences using the email address you supply. If you have any questions about this product then please contact us.

name: Personalised Cushions
description: These cushions can be personalised to include a name or a date and make the perfect gift, you can have; * A name, or * A date We put in a lot of time and effort to make sure that our personalised name cushions are just what you want. We have added a description here for you to read about how we aim to achieve this. Once an order is received we will contact you to find out a little more information about who and what it is for, the colours you would like used and what you would like to be included. We then set to work on making an original cushion just for you (or who ever you want it for). Using just a sewing machine and our years of experience we will make you a personalised cushion that is sure to put a smile on many faces. We can also theme you cushion with a basic picture as well as a name or word if you would like, see the price options in the drop down box below. Specification *Size: 45 x 45cm or 50 x 50cm *Insert: Polyester (feather available for an extra fee) *Materials used: Varios, mainly cottons and felts. *Completion time: 7 days approx We will contact you after you place your order to find out your wording and colour preferences using the email address you supply. If you have any questions about this product then please contact us.

name: Personalised Christmas Sacks
description: Our Personalised Christmas Sacks are a great way to make your Christmas present giving easier and much more enjoyable! These personalised sacks are fully lined and can include a name or a single word to suit your needs or make a perfect Christmas gift, you can have; * A name, or *An individual word You choose the style of fabric that you would like us to use from the photos. This will form the name and trimming around the top. Specification *Size: 54(w) x 80(h)cm *Materials used: Hessian, Selection of Cotton materials, and twine. *Fully lined *Completion time: 7 days approx We will contact you after you place your order to find out your wording and colour preferences using the email address you supply. If you have any questions about this product then please contact us.

name: Christmas Stockings
description: These Christmas stockings are great for the the mantelpiece or under the tree. They come in two colours, red or green. Specification *Size: 40(h) x 20(w) cm *Materials used: Felt and a selection of cotton materials. *Completion time: Ready to deliver If you have any questions about this product then please contact us.
